OBBox3

Defines a oriented bounding box (in 3D)

Members
Vector3 origin

center of the bbox

Vector3 u

X axis of the bbox

Vector3 v

Y axis of the bbox

Vector3 n

Z axis of the bbox

Vector3 normu

Normalized version of the u azis

Vector3 normv

Normalized version of the v azis

Vector3 normn

Normalized version of the n azis

Header

Base/Math/OBBox.h
